protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12701
protocol.text: Arabidopsis plants were grown for 6 to 7 weeks in sand and supplied with full nutrient. Then the root system was washed to discard sand and separated in 2 parts dipped in 2 containers (300mL each) containing either the same medium (500 uM or 0P) or different media (500 uM P or no P). 3 plants were pooled and triplicates were analysed.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12702
text: Total RNA from roots were extracted in phenol-chloroform (room temperature), precipitated in LiCl and purified with Dnase (DNAfree, Ambion). RNAs quality was checked by Agilent Lab-on-chip analysis.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-12703
text: Arabidopsis plants were grown for 6 to 7 weeks in sand and supplied with full nutrient. Then the root system was washed to discard sand and separated in 2 parts dipped in 2 containers (300mL each) containing either the same medium (500 uM or 0P) or different media (500 uM P or no P). 3 plants were pooled and triplicates were analysed.
(Parameters: start time = 2, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, max temperature = 24, temperature unit = C, media = MS/10 500micromolar Pi or 0P)
